typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerAlternateKey as string,
		GeographyAlternateKey as string,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		NameStyle as string,
		BirthDate as string,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		Suffix as string,
		Gender as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		YearlyIncome as string,
		TotalChildren as string,
		NumberChildrenAtHome as string,
		HouseOwnerFlag as string,
		NumberCarsOwned as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceCustomer
source(output(
		HUB_Customer_HK as string,
		CustomerAlternateKey as string,
		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HubCustomer
source(output(
		HUB_Customer_HK as string,
		SAT_Customer_HDIFF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SatCustomer
source(output(
		LINK_CustomerGeography_HK as string,
		HUB_Customer_HK as string,
		HUB_Geography_HK as string,
		CustomerAlternateKey as string,
		GeographyAlternateKey as string,
		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LinkCustomerGeography
SourceCustomer derive(LINK_CustomerGeography_HK = sha2(512, CustomerAlternateKey, GeographyAlternateKey),
		HUB_Customer_HK = sha2(512, CustomerAlternateKey),
		HUB_Geography_HK = sha2(512, GeographyAlternateKey),
		SAT_Customer_HDIFF = sha2(512, CustomerAlternateKey, GeographyAlternateKey,Title,FirstName,MiddleName,LastName,NameStyle,BirthDate,MaritalStatus,Suffix,Gender,EmailAddress,YearlyIncome,TotalChildren,NumberChildrenAtHome,HouseOwnerFlag,NumberCarsOwned,AddressLine1,AddressLine2),
		LOAD_TS = currentTimestamp()) ~> HashColumns
HashColumns, HubCustomer exists(HashColumns@HUB_Customer_HK == HubCustomer@HUB_Customer_HK,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CheckNewCustomer
CheckNewCustomer select(mapColumn(
		CustomerAlternateKey,
		HUB_Customer_HK,
		LOAD_TS
	)) ~> NewHubCustomer
NewHubCustomer sink(input(
		HUB_Customer_HK as string,
		CustomerAlternateKey as string,
		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> SinkHubCustomer
